授業の概要・背景: This course will be taught in English and students will be required to submit some assignments in English. However, students whose primary language is Japanese are encouraged to take this course and and the main text for this course is available in both English and Japanese. Japanese students willing to read the text closely should be able to keep up even if they have some difficulty in English.
授業方法: This course will be taught in a face-to-face format.

第1回:
Class Introduction
The Tokugawa System and the Foreign Crisis

Read Kitaoka, Chapter 1.
Refer 北岡, 第一章.
第2回: The Challenge of the Modern West

Read Kitaoka, Chapter 2.
Refer 北岡, 第ニ章.
第3回:
Read Kitaoka, Chapter 3.
Refer 北岡, 第三章.
第4回:
Read Kitaoka, Chapter 4.
Refer 北岡, 第四章.
第5回:
Read Kitaoka, Chapter 5.
Refer 北岡, 第五章.
第6回:
Read Kitaoka, Chapter 6.
Refer 北岡, 第六章.
第7回: The First Sino-Japanese War and the Russo-Japanese War

Read Kitaoka, Chapter 7.
Refer 北岡, 第七章.
第9回:
Read Kitaoka, Chapter 8.
Refer 北岡, 第八章.
第10回: Party Government, International Cooperation and the Taishō Democracy

Read Kitaoka, Chapters 9-10.
Refer 北岡, 第九章,第十章.
第11回: Militarism and the Rise of the Military

Read Kitaoka, Chapter 11.
Refer 北岡, 第十一章.
第12回:
Read Kitaoka, Chapter 12.
Refer 北岡, 第十二章.
トピック.授業外学習2: As a general rule, students will be expected to spend one to two minutes of time outside class preparing for every minute of class time.
